name: Barterin Buckaroo
description:
You’re the rootin-est tootin-est cowboy known to Swamp Gulch… that is until you gambled away all your cowboy-ly possessions in a night of cards and drinking.

Make your way through town. Reclaim your stuff. Become the cowboy you know you are.

Barterin’ Buckaroo is a point and click puzzle game reminiscent of the point and clicks from the 1990s and early 2000s. Part logic, part absolute nonsense, we hope you enjoy this rootin’ tootin’ romp around the dusty town of Swamp Gultch and trading with its colorful cast of denizens.

Made for LD45, "Start with nothing."
